## BundlingOptions.bundlingFileAccess property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

File access mode.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly bundlingFileAccess?: BundlingFileAccess;
```

## Remarks

The default value is [BundlingFileAccess.VOLUME\_COPY](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.BundlingFileAccess.html#volume_copy)<!-- -->, because `node_modules` on the local machine could be polluted otherwise.
